title: Covid: England lockdown rules to end on 19 July, PM confirms
content:
1. Covid: England lockdown rules to end on 19 July, PM confirms  BBC News
  2. Health secretary Sajid Javid confirms lifting of restrictions on 19 July  Guardian News
  3. UK government confirms plan to lift lockdown measures in England despite fears over delta surge  CNBC
  4. The NHS is already overstretched – dropping Covid restrictions will spell disaster for patients  The Guardian
  5. The NHS backlog is another good reason to end the lockdown  Telegraph.co.uk
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid: England lockdown rules to end on 19 July, PM confirms  BBC News
Health secretary Sajid Javid confirms lifting of restrictions on 19 July  Guardian News
UK government confirms plan to lift lockdown measures in England despite fears over delta surge  CNBC
The NHS is already overstretched – dropping Covid restrictions will spell disaster for patients  The Guardian
The NHS backlog is another good reason to end the lockdown  Telegraph.co.uk
